hero.name: Matkarim
hero.description: 4.5+ years of experience building production-grade web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript

about.title: About Me
about.description: Frontend Developer with 4.5+ years of experience. Currently working as a Software Engineer at UNICON-SOFT (Tashkent).
about.whoIAmText: I'm a Frontend Developer with over 4.5 years of professional experience. I specialize in building enterprise-grade web applications. I have deep expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I focus on clean architecture, performance optimization, and delivering polished user experiences.
about.experience1Description: Developing and maintaining web applications for educational institutions. Writing code, fixing bugs, refactoring, and designing user interfaces.
about.experience2Description: Implementing functionality and logic according to technical specifications and architectural decisions. Writing and optimizing code, analyzing bugs, and conducting code reviews.
about.experience3Description: Developing and maintaining client-side web applications for the educational institution. Writing and optimizing code.
about.experience4Description: Earned a Bachelor's degree with a strong foundation in software development, algorithms, and system design.
